docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: MkDocs GitHub連携 MkDocsで作ったサイトを github で公開する手順 githubで空のレポジトリを作成 仮にmydocsとする git clone mydocs mkdocs new mydocs mkdocs gh-deploy githubのrepositoryから settings → GitHub Pages → Source → gh-pages branch https://user.github.com/mydocsにアクセス Extensions material おすすめテーマ pip install mkdocs-material mkdocs.yml に以下を追加 theme: name: 'material'
docs.title: MkDocs

docs.text: MkDocsで作ったサイトを github で公開する手順 githubで空のレポジトリを作成 仮にmydocsとする git clone mydocs mkdocs new mydocs mkdocs gh-deploy githubのrepositoryから settings → GitHub Pages → Source → gh-pages branch https://user.github.com/mydocsにアクセス
docs.title: GitHub連携

docs.text: おすすめテーマ pip install mkdocs-material mkdocs.yml に以下を追加 theme: name: 'material'
docs.title: material

docs.text: serveo SSHクライアントをつかって、SSH接続/ローカルWebページを公開できる Alternatives ngrok https://ngrok.com localtunel https://localtunnel.me/
docs.title: serveo
